Manually running the automated tests

Orca has a set of automated test to help maintain things.

Installing Required Stuff

  • Download Dart software from the Kitware website. Currently, this requires CVS.
  • install Dart on your machine (copy the Dart source into /usr/local/Dart)
  • set the environment variable DART_ROOT (to /usr/local/Dart)
    • export DART_ROOT=/usr/local/Dart
  • (NOTE: you need to delete CMakeCache.txt and re-do 'cmake' to read in this variable)

    • Running Tests

    From the top level of either orca-base or orca-components, try:

    ctest -D ExperimentalTest

    To see the output of the tests, do:

    ctest -V -D ExperimentalTest

    To only run specific tests, do:

    ctest -V -D ExperimentalTest -R <part of test name>
